channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
[code]client.java:386: cannot find symbol symbol : variable clanRights location: class client && (p.clanRights >= 0) &&
^ client.java:388: cannot find symbol symbol : variable AAE location: class client (p.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(AAE))) { ^ client.java:388: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myClanName location: class client (p.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(AAE))) { ^ client.java:10709: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myClanName location: class client clanChat("[" + myClanName + "]" + playerName + ": " ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
how to fix these?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Ape_Atoll_Escape Ape Atoll Escape
item.description:
@Ape_Atoll_Escape wrote:

i added this

[code] public void clanChat(String msg) {
for (Player element : handler.players) {
client p = (client) element;
if ((p != null) && !p.disconnected && (p.absX > 0)
&& (p.clanRights >= 0) &&

                       (p.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(AAE))) {
			p.sendMessage(msg);
		}
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well you have to define those variables somewhere. The thing doesn’t know what they are if you never told it.

Read full topic
